message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
Let's be fair and split it evenly. We both get the most this way!
You wanted to split it evenly last round, but I think I can do better than that. Your turn again!
I'm willing to be generous, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's compromise!
You're getting a bit greedy, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more than 35. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot!
Okay, I'm seeing your point. Let's try splitting it 45/55.  It's closer to your last offer, and I'm willing to budge a bit more.
You're getting closer, Bob, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's see if we can meet in the middle... again!
